header-info: My First Website Using HTML and CSS
project-desc: In 2022, I decided to brush up on my programming skills. I started with Python and wrote several small programs. One day, a friend showed me how to connect these programs to the frontend, which inspired me to learn frontend development as well. In the past, I had created a few websites using Flash, which is now an outdated technology. I found a tutorial on web development and learned the basics of HTML and CSS in two weeks. It went quite smoothly for me. Then, I decided to create my first website. Since I enjoyed it so much, I dedicated a week of continuous work to it, resulting in this website.
